name: Aurius
loreDescription: Legendary hero Knight Commander Rowell's tower shield.

skillDescription.base: Increases ally's Defense by 10%, and takes 10% of the damage suffered by them. Does not overlap with an Artifact providing the same effect.
skillDescription.max: Increases ally's Defense by 10%, and takes 20% of the damage suffered by them. Does not overlap with an Artifact providing the same effect.
